display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=n3cf1wT75ZwQ7kNvwGbJr1-&_nc_oc=AdlU7GfcJ_K5GmsXgp6df7ZyvLSYEvaZyrtZEjNMN02VL35OWHEQgNV6kKsmPEonhu0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=dQfSsKd7orh-aJVCRj8aRQ&oh=00_AfrF_UdVmV3ZcoiymQEfolH9cxg8xUUNGCOGIDmD3YqAbA&oe=6977719D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=pui3-4O25X4Q7kNvwEqlolo&_nc_oc=AdmpLIR0zZqr6NVewfNOeAOeX4Qyijd9MtGCP4RjjfngC2YNhSY8iJBdN05BqNkV4Q4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=dQfSsKd7orh-aJVCRj8aRQ&oh=00_AfrSdeZ8m2PK62fsHf7I9I4g8KgjdNsera7_4y2GNlSECA&oe=69778B92)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=KG_4yaPpNhEQ7kNvwEI6EQB&_nc_oc=AdlvVurK64ij59mpS9jN3lVd3ap5zvOVQkvSsCHDn0O2__gvf6Ul0JtkK9_bAIkWQyc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=dQfSsKd7orh-aJVCRj8aRQ&oh=00_AfqhanWsCiRA8Q9YwmzhF300-CHsU4Wxy5daz8LQLaT12Q&oe=697791A3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Js7Pg08-84wQ7kNvwGg9Drg&_nc_oc=AdnBcj9VWo7NyTV7HuTho7ACJ_ELg_3iv0ZvwNnBcpaTTKLyHXjZGV0Fv-JHVvZ_4R4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=dQfSsKd7orh-aJVCRj8aRQ&oh=00_Afp5ju2QQayMgEiZo_cEg-RBDYToa90pQRjGCHuHuoKkbg&oe=6977882E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=GQpd3ReP3WcQ7kNvwENVT8z&_nc_oc=AdlTwncQHyEnyAn72zd5XJ0iBVdeJe0V2kOt5qKNmv4IzahZqXxjintFQFG2u-uHv6c&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=dQfSsKd7orh-aJVCRj8aRQ&oh=00_Afp8wPr0o2tYeSefpjUGe0hQ7HlEVyC7uytTU39F_Agw6g&oe=69779016)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
